price: 91. Voilà ce qu’il en fut. Et Nous Cernions de Notre connaissance tout ce qui le concernait.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
